summary:
Customer sentiment: Frustrated  
Primary Concern: Order was automatically canceled due to rider unavailability, and the customer did not receive a refund.  
Identified Problem: The customer experienced a delay in receiving their order due to the unavailability of a rider, leading to an automatic cancellation of the order.  
Contributing Factors:  
- High volume of orders at the outlet due to ongoing promotions, causing delays.  
- Miscommunication regarding the order status and refund process, as the customer was not informed clearly about the refund.  
Resolution Offered: The agent confirmed that the refund for the order had been processed.  
Overall Summary: The customer expressed frustration over their order being automatically canceled due to rider unavailability and not receiving a refund. The main issue stemmed from a high volume of orders at the outlet, which led to delays and miscommunication about the order status. The agent eventually confirmed that the refund had been processed, but the customer remained dissatisfied with the overall experience.

Customer sentiment: Frustrated  
Primary Concern: Inability to update or delete credit card details  
Identified Problem: System limitation preventing the update of credit card information  
Contributing Factors:  
- Lack of clear instructions on how to update credit card details  
- Miscommunication regarding the retention of previous credit card information

The agent initially misunderstood the request and provided unrelated information about redeeming gift cards. After clarification, the agent informed the customer that previous credit card information is not retained and suggested adding new details. However, the customer was unable to delete or update her credit card, leading to frustration. The agent requested a screen recording to escalate the issue but ultimately closed the chat without a resolution. The root cause appears to be a system limitation and unclear communication regarding the update process.

text:
Hi there,
I am at Jaya One right now and I just ordered a CEO latte from counter, when I read in the receipt that I have actually earned 9 Zus Points from the order. 

When I try to scan the qr it leads me to nowhere. I checked with your cashier they told me if purchase made from counter (not from the App) needs to provide mobile no. Clearly your cashier did not ask me prior to my order and they told me it is too bad they can't do anything about it. 

As a first time Zus App user and also a new Zus customers, I feel kinda disappointed towards your staffs here although your coffee is serve as good as my expectations. I am a seasoned home barista for years FYI. 

Just sharing an experience at Zus Jaya One. 


Regards
Marco Lai
0175876499




Hi Marco Lai,  Greetings from ZUS Coffee!¬†  I trust this message finds you well.¬†  Thank you once again for reaching out to us regarding your concern.¬†  We hope that our recent assistance has been helpful to you.  Should you have any further questions, encounter any issues, or require additional assistance, please do not hesitate to contact us. We are here to ensure that your experience with us is as smooth and satisfactory as possible.  Thank you for choosing our services. We look forward to hearing from you soon.     -- Best Regards,   Selvind Rajendran Customer Happiness Specialist¬†    E. support@zuscoffee.com  W.¬†www.zuscoffee.com
Thank you for the swift response. Regards Marco Lai 
Hi Marco,     Greetings from ZUS Coffee!     Thank you for taking the time to share your experience with us. We truly appreciate your feedback and are glad to hear that you enjoyed the quality of our coffee.     We apologize for the inconvenience you encountered with the Zus Points and the QR code. It is important to us that every customer has a seamless experience, and we regret that this was not the case during your visit.¬†     We will address this issue with our team at Jaya One to ensure that all customers are properly informed about the process for earning points and that our staff requests the necessary information during transactions. As a gesture of goodwill, we have inserted the points to your Zus account with the 9 Zus Points you earned.¬†     Thank you for bringing this to our attention and for giving us the opportunity to improve. We look forward to serving you better in the future.     Best regards,    Best Regards,  Khuzairi Customer Happiness Specialist    E. support@zuscoffee.com  W.¬†www.zuscoffee.com
summary:
Customer sentiment: Disappointed  
Primary Concern: Inability to earn Zus Points due to lack of communication from staff  
Identified Problem: Miscommunication regarding the process for earning Zus Points when ordering at the counter  
Contributing Factors:  
- Staff did not inform the customer about the need to provide a mobile number for points accumulation  
- Customer was not aware of the QR code scanning process and its requirements  
Resolution Offered: Points were manually added to the customer's Zus account, and the issue will be addressed with the staff at Jaya One  
Overall Summary: The customer, Marco Lai, expressed disappointment over not being able to earn Zus Points due to a lack of communication from the staff at the Jaya One location. The main issue stemmed from the cashier not informing him about the need to provide a mobile number for points accumulation. The company acknowledged the issue, apologized, and manually added the points to his account while promising to improve staff training on the process.

summary:
Customer sentiment: Frustrated  
Primary Concern: Quality of food received (specifically the curry puff)  
Identified Problem: The curry puff was burnt and hard, leading the customer to question the freshness of the food.  
Contributing Factors:  
- The customer received a product that appeared to be old or reheated, indicating potential issues with food handling or quality control at the outlet.  
- The customer has experienced this issue multiple times with the same outlet, suggesting a recurring problem.  
Resolution Offered: A refund for the ZUS Signature Curry Puff was processed, and the issue was escalated to the supplier for review.  
Overall Summary: The customer expressed significant dissatisfaction with the quality of the curry puff received, describing it as burnt and hard, and questioning its freshness. This was not an isolated incident, as the customer noted it was the second occurrence of receiving subpar food from the same outlet. The agent acknowledged the complaint, apologized, and offered a refund while escalating the issue to the supplier. The root cause appears to be inadequate food quality control and handling practices at the outlet level.

Please contact our Customer Happiness team via Live Chat OR WhatsApp us at 6012-8161340 within

What packaging is not considered delivery-friendly?
Items that are prone to damage/spillage during delivery as they were not packed securely.  

- Damaged packaging [For NON-LIQUID] - Eg: The food packaging has cracks, rips, leaks or deformations, etc. These damages were NOT caused by liquid spillage 
- Spillage [For LIQUID ITEM ONLY] - Eg: Liquid items flowed out of its cup.

Kindly note that refunds are done based on a case-by-case basis.
We'll also notify our outlets and delivery partner to prevent this from happening again.

summary:
Customer sentiment: Disappointed  
Primary Concern: Delay in order delivery beyond the scheduled time  
Identified Problem: Technical issues leading to the order not being received by the outlet  
Contributing Factors:  
- System errors affecting order processing  
- High volume of inquiries causing delays in customer service response  
Resolution Offered: Order was canceled, refund issued to ZUS Balance, and voucher reinstated  
Overall Summary: The customer expressed frustration over a delayed coffee order that was supposed to be delivered at 1:45 PM but was not received even after 15 minutes past the scheduled time. The agent informed the customer of a technical issue that prevented the order from being processed. The customer was offered a cancellation and refund, which they accepted, along with the reinstatement of a used voucher. The interaction highlighted a system error and high inquiry volume as the root causes of the issue, leading to a disappointing experience for the customer.

summary:
Customer sentiment: Frustrated  
Primary Concern: Customer requested a refund due to an incorrect order caused by a power outage at the outlet.  
Identified Problem: The outlet was unable to prepare the customer's drink due to a power cut, leading to the request for a refund.  
Contributing Factors:  
- Power outage at the outlet, which was an unexpected emergency situation.  
- Miscommunication regarding the order ID and refund process, leading to delays in assistance.  
Resolution Offered: The customer was refunded to their ZUS Balance and received a 20% discount voucher as compensation.  
Overall Summary: The customer experienced frustration due to a power outage at the outlet, which prevented their drink from being prepared. This led to a request for a refund. Although the refund was processed, the customer expressed dissatisfaction with the time wasted and sought compensation. The agent offered a 20% discount voucher as a one-time exception, which the customer accepted. The root cause of the issue was the unexpected power cut affecting the outlet's operations.

summary:
Customer sentiment: Disappointed  
Primary Concern: Customer did not receive loyalty points due to staff error.  
Identified Problem: Staff member forgot to input the customer's loyalty number during the transaction.  
Contributing Factors:  
- Lack of attention or oversight by the staff member during the transaction.  
- Possible miscommunication between the customer and the staff regarding the loyalty program.  
Resolution Offered: The issue was escalated to the appropriate team for further action to prevent future occurrences.  
Overall Summary: The customer expressed disappointment after a visit to a ZUS Coffee outlet where their loyalty number was not recorded, resulting in the loss of points. The agent acknowledged the issue and assured that it would be addressed with the staff to prevent similar errors in the future. The primary cause of the issue was identified as a staff oversight during the transaction.

summary:
Customer sentiment: Frustrated  
Primary Concern: Incomplete order delivery and cancellation request  
Identified Problem: Technical issues leading to rider unavailability and incorrect order fulfillment  
Contributing Factors:  
- High volume of customer inquiries causing delays in service  
- System errors affecting order preparation and rider assignment  
Resolution Offered: Refunds to the customer's bank account for the incomplete orders  
Overall Summary: The customer, Tiffany Ngu, expressed frustration over receiving incomplete orders and the inability to cancel an order due to rider unavailability. The agent acknowledged the issues, attributed them to technical problems and high inquiry volume, and offered refunds to the customer's bank account. The interaction highlighted systemic issues in order processing and communication, leading to the customer's dissatisfaction.

summary:
Customer sentiment: Frustrated  
Primary Concern: Reload amount not credited to the wallet  
Identified Problem: System error or miscommunication regarding transaction status  
Contributing Factors:  
- Multiple transactions made by the customer, with one transaction failing according to the system.  
- Confusion regarding the successful transactions and the actual credited amount in the wallet.  
Resolution Offered: The agent confirmed successful transactions in the system and advised the customer to check their balance and transaction history, suggesting they contact their bank for the failed transaction.  
Overall Summary: The customer, Nursyafiqah Samian, faced an issue where the reload amount was not credited to her wallet despite multiple transactions. The agent identified three successful transactions in the system but noted one failure. The customer expressed frustration over the discrepancy between the system's records and her actual wallet balance. The resolution involved checking the transaction history and contacting the bank for further assistance, highlighting a potential system error or miscommunication as the root cause of the issue.

summary:
Customer sentiment: Frustrated  
Primary Concern: Missing items from the order  
Identified Problem: The order was not delivered as expected due to rider cancellations.  
Contributing Factors:  
- The customer ordered items for a special occasion (mother's birthday), increasing the emotional weight of the situation.  
- Communication issues due to poor phone reception in the customer's location, making it difficult to coordinate with the rider.  
Resolution Offered: The agent offered to resend the order and provided the rider's contact details for further communication.  
Overall Summary: The customer expressed frustration over missing items from their order, which was intended for a special occasion. The root cause of the issue was identified as the cancellation of the delivery by both riders, compounded by the customer's poor phone reception in a remote area. The agent proposed to resend the order and provided the necessary contact information to facilitate communication with the assigned rider.

summary:
Customer sentiment: Satisfied  
Primary Concern: Refund for a mistakenly ordered drink  
Identified Problem: Miscommunication regarding the refund process  
Contributing Factors:  
- Customer double-clicked the quantity, leading to an accidental order  
- Customer was instructed by the outlet to contact customer service for the refund  
Resolution Offered: Refund of RM11.90 processed to the customer's ZUS Balance  
Overall Summary: The customer, Fatu, contacted customer service to request a refund for a CEO latte extra shot that was mistakenly ordered due to a double-click. The outlet had advised her to reach out to customer service for the refund. After confirming the details, the agent processed the refund to her ZUS Balance, which was completed successfully. The main issue stemmed from a miscommunication about the refund process following an accidental order. The customer expressed satisfaction with the resolution.

summary:
Customer sentiment: Frustrated  
Primary Concern: Delay in order delivery and cancellation of the original rider  
Identified Problem: The original delivery rider canceled the order, leading to a delay in delivery  
Contributing Factors:  
- Lack of timely communication regarding the cancellation of the original rider  
- Extended refund process (14 working days) causing additional frustration  
Resolution Offered: Refund processed to the customer's bank account upon providing necessary details  
Overall Summary: The customer expressed frustration over a delayed order that was canceled by the original rider. The agent informed the customer about the cancellation and reassigned a new rider, but the order still did not arrive in a timely manner. The customer opted to cancel the order and requested a refund, which the agent facilitated but noted it would take 14 working days to process. The root cause of the issue was the cancellation of the original rider, which was not communicated promptly, leading to the customer's dissatisfaction.

Customer sentiment: Frustrated  
Primary Concern: Received the wrong item in the order (chocolate instead of Vietnamese Spanish Latte)  
Identified Problem: Miscommunication or error in order fulfillment leading to the delivery of an incorrect drink  
Contributing Factors:  
- Lack of clear labeling on the drinks, making it difficult for the customer to identify the correct item  
- Possible system or operational error in the preparation and packing of the order  
Resolution Offered: Refund to the customer's ZUS Balance for the incorrect drink

The agent acknowledged the issue and requested a photo for verification. After confirming that only one drink was incorrect, the agent offered a refund to the customer's ZUS Balance, which was accepted. The interaction highlighted a miscommunication or operational error in the order fulfillment process, compounded by the lack of labeling on the drinks. The customer expressed frustration but ultimately received a resolution.

Customer sentiment: Appreciative  
Primary Concern: Missing item from the order (Iced Zirty Matcha)  
Identified Problem: The item was not included in the order due to packing errors.  
Contributing Factors:  
- Lack of attention during order preparation and packing.  
- Potential miscommunication regarding the order contents.

Overall Summary: The customer initially reported a missing Iced Zirty Matcha from their order. The agent acknowledged the issue and facilitated the resending of the missing item. The customer expressed gratitude for the resolution. A secondary issue arose with another order due to a lack of a rider, which was also resolved with a refund credited to the customer's balance. The root cause of the initial issue was identified as a packing error, which the agent assured would be addressed in the future.

Customer sentiment: Frustrated

Identified Problem: Miscommunication regarding the order cancellation and the status of the order.

- The customer was unable to reach the delivery worker for confirmation of the cancellation.

Overall Summary: The customer expressed frustration over being charged for an order they could not pick up due to an urgent matter. They attempted to cancel the order through the delivery worker but were unable to confirm the cancellation, leading to confusion about the order status. Ultimately, the agent issued a refund to the customer's ZUS Balance as a resolution, highlighting a miscommunication as the root cause of the issue.

summary:
Customer sentiment: Frustrated  
Primary Concern: Delay in order delivery  
Identified Problem: Original rider canceled the order after one hour, leading to a delay in delivery.  
Contributing Factors:  
- The customer ordered the drink at 10:37 AM, and it was not delivered for over two hours.  
- Miscommunication regarding the status of the order and the rider's location.  
Resolution Offered: A refund was issued to the customer's ZUS Balance, and a replacement drink was offered.  
Overall Summary: The customer experienced significant delays with their coffee order, initially placed over two hours prior. The original rider canceled after one hour, leading to frustration and concern about the quality of the drink. The agent offered a refund and a replacement drink as resolutions. The root cause of the issue was the cancellation of the original rider, compounded by miscommunication about the order status.

Hi Thor Boon Leong,  Greetings from ZUS Coffee,     We have submitted the refund request via Razer (payment gateway system) based on the given information.¬†   Please note, that there will not be any charges on your credit card for same-day cancellation.    However, if the amount is captured in your credit card statement, please be informed that the refund process will take an estimated within¬†14 working days, excluded weekends and public holiday.¬†         -- Best Regards,  Fatin Customer Happiness Specialist¬†    E. support@zuscoffee.com  W.¬†www.zuscoffee.com
summary:
Customer sentiment: Frustrated  
Primary Concern: Double payment charges resulting in only receiving RM50 instead of RM100.  
Identified Problem: A potential system error or banking issue leading to incorrect transaction processing.  
Contributing Factors:  
- Miscommunication regarding the transaction amount.  
- Possible banking error affecting the payment processing.  
Resolution Offered: Refund request submitted to the financial team, with a processing time of up to 14 working days.  
Overall Summary: The customer, Thor Boon Leong, reported a double payment issue where he reloaded RM100 but only received RM50. The agent acknowledged the issue, attributing it to a possible banking error, and initiated a refund process. The customer was informed that the refund could take up to 14 working days to reflect in his account. The interaction concluded with the customer expressing gratitude for the assistance provided. The root cause appears to be a combination of a system error and potential banking issues affecting the transaction.

summary:
Customer sentiment: Frustrated  
Primary Concern: Voucher not appearing in the app after redemption  
Identified Problem: Technical issue with the app preventing the voucher from displaying  
Contributing Factors:  
- Miscommunication regarding the number of points redeemed (initially stated as 300 points instead of 250)  
- Requirement for the customer to provide a specific file format for evidence (JPG, PNG, MP4) which may have caused confusion  
Resolution Offered: Issue raised to the relevant team for further investigation, with a promise to update the customer within 1-3 days  
Overall Summary: The customer experienced a technical issue with the app where a redeemed voucher did not appear in their account. The agent acknowledged the problem, apologized for the confusion regarding the points redeemed, and escalated the issue for further investigation. The root cause appears to be a technical malfunction within the app, compounded by initial miscommunication about the redemption details. The customer was informed they would receive an update within a few days.

The root cause of the issue appears to be a combination of miscommunication regarding the delivery location and a delay in addressing the customer's concerns.

summary:
Customer sentiment: Frustrated  
Primary Concern: Received a warm latte instead of an extra hot one and insufficient quantity.  
Identified Problem: Quality control issues during drink preparation and delivery.  
Contributing Factors:  
- Inconsistent drink temperature and quantity in recent orders.  
- Thicker foam dissipating during delivery, leading to reduced liquid volume.  
Resolution Offered: Refund of RM9.90 processed via ZUS Balance; option to resend two extra hot lattes with waived delivery fee.  
Overall Summary: The customer expressed frustration over receiving a warm latte instead of the requested extra hot version, along with concerns about the quantity. The agent acknowledged the issue, offered a refund, and proposed to resend the drinks. The root cause appears to be quality control issues during preparation and delivery, which the outlet manager will investigate for future improvements.

Customer sentiment: Relieved  
Primary Concern: Payment for a gift card was deducted but not reflected in the app.  
Identified Problem: Technical issue with the app that caused payment discrepancies.  
Contributing Factors:  
- System error affecting payment processing and app functionality.  
- Miscommunication regarding the order ID, leading to repeated requests for clarification.  
Resolution Offered: The agent confirmed that the technical issue was resolved and advised the customer to log out and back into the app to see the updated payment status.  
Overall Summary: The customer initially faced an issue where a payment for a gift card was deducted but not reflected in the app. After several attempts to clarify the order ID and report the issue, the agent acknowledged a technical problem that had been affecting payments. The agent assured the customer that the issue was resolved and provided instructions to check the updated status. The customer expressed relief that the problem was solved.

summary:
Customer sentiment: Frustrated  
Primary Concern: Lack of cup holders and straws, leading to spilled drinks and an unpleasant experience.  
Identified Problem: Inadequate preparation and service at the coffee shop, including missing cup holders and straws, and cleanliness issues with flies.  
Contributing Factors:  
- Poor inventory management regarding cup holders and straws.  
- Cleanliness and pest control issues in the shop.  
Resolution Offered: A refund of RM 13.9 to the customer's ZUS balance as an apology for the inconvenience.  
Overall Summary: The customer expressed frustration over receiving drinks without cup holders or straws, which caused spills and a messy situation. Additionally, they noted a cleanliness issue with flies in the shop. The agent offered a refund as compensation and assured the customer that the issues would be communicated to the outlet management. The customer received the refund and requested improvements in service, particularly regarding cup holders and cleanliness. The root cause of the issue appears to be inadequate service preparation and maintenance at the coffee shop.

agent: We're sincerely sorry that your drinks/food has arrived in poor conditions. 

Please contact our Customer Happiness team via Live Chat OR WhatsApp us at 6012-8161340 within
8 hours from the delivery time. Kindly submit a clear picture along with the information related to this issue as below:

What packaging is not considered delivery-friendly?
Items that are prone to damage/spillage during delivery as they were not packed securely.  

- Damaged packaging [For NON-LIQUID] - Eg: The food packaging has cracks, rips, leaks or deformations, etc. These damages were NOT caused by liquid spillage 
- Spillage [For LIQUID ITEM ONLY] - Eg: Liquid items flowed out of its cup.

Kindly note that refunds are done based on a case-by-case basis.
We'll also notify our outlets and delivery partner to prevent this from happening again.

summary:
Customer sentiment: Frustrated  
Primary Concern: Missing espresso in the ordered drink  
Identified Problem: Miscommunication regarding the order preparation and delivery/pickup options  
Contributing Factors:  
- Customer did not receive the complete drink as ordered (missing espresso)  
- Automated system defaulted to pickup without confirming customer preference for delivery  
Resolution Offered: Refund into ZUS Balance and replacement drink offered for pickup  
Overall Summary: The customer, Raymond, experienced an issue with his order where the espresso was missing from his drink. The interaction revealed a miscommunication regarding the delivery and pickup options, as the system defaulted to pickup without confirming the customer's preference. Although a replacement drink was offered, the customer was frustrated by the need to arrange for pickup and the associated costs. Ultimately, the agent offered a refund into the customer's ZUS Balance as a resolution.

Customer sentiment: Frustrated  
Primary Concern: Delay in order preparation and delivery  
Identified Problem: The order was taking longer than expected to be prepared and picked up by the rider.  
Contributing Factors:

The agent facilitated a resolution by arranging a new rider and filing a complaint about the previous rider's performance. The root cause of the issue appears to be a combination of order preparation delays and miscommunication regarding the expected pickup time.

The agent acknowledged the issues and promised to escalate the concerns for further investigation.

The agent acknowledged the complaint, escalated it for further investigation, and offered a discount voucher as a gesture of goodwill. The customer hopes for improved service in the future.

The root cause appears to be a lack of communication from the delivery rider, which the company plans to address to improve future service.

The main issue stemmed from a lack of real-time updates in the app, which caused confusion regarding the order status and membership rewards.

agent: Every ZUS Coffee is a cup of clean, consistent and well-handled coffee. With the best quality ingredients, high-level coffee brewing technology and innovative business model, we are evolving the concept of coffee consumption to make specialty coffee affordable for everyone, everyday.

summary:
Customer sentiment: Frustrated  
Primary Concern: Missing order that was picked up by someone else  
Identified Problem: Miscommunication regarding the order pickup process  
Contributing Factors:  
- Lack of clarity in the initial communication from the customer  
- Possible system error or oversight in order management leading to the order being picked up by another person  
Resolution Offered: The agent informed the outlet of the customer's intended pickup time and promised to improve service in the future.  
Overall Summary: The customer expressed frustration over not receiving their order, which was reportedly picked up by someone else. The main issue stemmed from a miscommunication regarding the order pickup process, potentially exacerbated by a system error. The agent acknowledged the issue and assured the customer that their feedback would be taken into account for future improvements. The customer was informed about their pickup time, but the interaction highlighted a need for clearer communication and order management.

summary:
Customer sentiment: Frustrated  
Primary Concern: Difficulty in changing the registered contact number  
Identified Problem: The new contact number is already registered in the system, preventing the update.  
Contributing Factors:  
- The customer was unable to communicate their request clearly due to language barriers and misunderstanding of the menu options.  
- The system's inability to recognize and process the request for changing the contact number due to existing registration of the new number.  
Resolution Offered: The agent suggested that the customer delete the account associated with the old number to proceed with the change.  
Overall Summary: The customer, Jason Ong, faced challenges in changing his registered contact number due to a misunderstanding of the process and the fact that the new number was already registered in the system. The agent attempted to assist but ultimately advised the customer to delete the old account to facilitate the change. The interaction highlighted issues with communication and system limitations, leading to customer frustration.

summary:
Customer sentiment: Frustrated  
Primary Concern: Order not received despite being marked as delivered  
Identified Problem: Miscommunication regarding the delivery status and the rider's actions  
Contributing Factors:  
- The rider marked the order as delivered without confirming with the customer.  
- The customer did not receive any calls from the rider, leading to confusion.  
Resolution Offered: The agent offered to resend the order to the same delivery address and provided a new order ID for tracking.  
Overall Summary: The customer expressed frustration over not receiving their order, which was marked as delivered. The issue stemmed from a miscommunication where the rider returned the order without contacting the customer. The agent acknowledged the problem, confirmed the customer's details, and arranged for the order to be resent, while also indicating that action would be taken regarding the rider's conduct.

summary:
Customer sentiment: Frustrated  
Primary Concern: Incorrect delivery location leading to potential return of the order  
Identified Problem: The delivery location was pinned incorrectly in the app, despite the customer entering the correct address.  
Contributing Factors:  
- Miscommunication regarding the pinned location versus the entered address  
- Lack of immediate resolution options for the customer to change the pinned location themselves  
Resolution Offered: Refund to ZUS balance and advice to reinstall the app to correct the pinned location.  
Overall Summary: The customer experienced frustration due to an incorrect delivery location that was pinned in the app, despite providing the correct address. The agent confirmed the issue and offered a refund while advising against using the app for future orders until the issue was resolved. The root cause appears to be a miscommunication regarding the app's functionality and the inability for the customer to change the pinned location directly. The customer was advised to reinstall the app to rectify the issue.

summary:
Customer sentiment: Frustrated  
Primary Concern: Unable to log in due to a terminated phone number and not receiving OTP  
Identified Problem: The customer topped up a phone number that is no longer active, preventing them from receiving the OTP needed to log in.  
Contributing Factors:  
- The phone number used for the account has been terminated.  
- Miscommunication regarding the correct phone number for the top-up.  
Resolution Offered: The agent suggested withdrawing the RM10 balance and deleting the account associated with the terminated number or changing the phone number. The refund process was initiated.  
Overall Summary: The customer faced an issue logging into their account because they topped up a phone number that was terminated, which prevented them from receiving the OTP. The agent acknowledged the problem and offered a resolution by suggesting a refund and account deletion or phone number change. The customer expressed gratitude for the assistance provided.

summary:
Customer sentiment: Frustrated  
Primary Concern: Payment error and refund process for a cancelled order  
Identified Problem: The customer experienced a payment failure and delay in receiving a refund after cancelling an order due to an item being out of stock.  
Contributing Factors:  
- The initial payment was marked as successful despite the order being cancelled.  
- Lack of clear communication regarding the refund process and timeline.  
Resolution Offered: The agent offered an immediate refund to the customer's ZUS Balance and assured that the voucher would be credited back after the refund was processed.  
Overall Summary: The customer faced a payment issue related to a cancelled order, which led to frustration over the lack of immediate refunds and clarity on the process. The agent eventually resolved the issue by processing the refund to the customer's ZUS Balance and confirming the return of the voucher, addressing the customer's concerns satisfactorily. The root cause appears to be a combination of system errors regarding payment status and miscommunication about the refund process.

Customer sentiment: Frustrated  
Primary Concern: Invalid voucher and out-of-stock cake refund  
Identified Problem: The customer faced issues with an invalid voucher and a cake that was out of stock, leading to a request for a refund.  
Contributing Factors:  
- The initial confusion regarding the order ID and voucher validity.  
- Lack of clarity on the availability of the cake, which was not communicated prior to the order.  
Resolution Offered: The agent confirmed that the refund for the cake would be processed to the customer's ZUS Balance and assured that the birthday voucher would also be refunded.  
Overall Summary: The customer initially contacted support regarding an invalid voucher and later requested a refund for a cake that was out of stock. The agent confirmed the successful payment but needed to clarify the order ID. After determining the cake was out of stock, the agent processed the refund to the customer's ZUS Balance and assured the return of the birthday voucher. The root cause of the issue stemmed from a lack of communication regarding product availability and voucher validity.

agent: Here is how you can redeem your ZUS Gift Card: 

1. The recipient receives a ZUS Gift Card redemption code via Email/SMS.
2. Go to ZUS Balance Top Up section.
3. Select Top Up Using Gift Voucher.
4. Key in redemption code. 
5. Click Redeem.

OR

1. The recipient receives ZUS Gift Card redemption code via Email/SMS.
2. Click on the link.
3. It will redirect the user to ZUS Balance Gift Voucher redemption page with the redemption code prefilled.
4. Click Redeem.

The interaction concluded with the customer expressing gratitude for the assistance provided.

agent: Here is how you can send out ZUS Gift Cards to your friends and family:  

1. Go to the Account Page & select Gift Card. 
2. Select your preferred gift card design.
3. Enter your gift amount between RM10 - RM300 (no cents). 
4. Fill in your {sender} name, and recipient‚Äôs name.
5. Choose to send to the recipient‚Äôs email address or phone number. 
6. Add your personalised message. 
7. Proceed to Checkout and process your payment. Once completed, an invoice will be sent to your registered email.
8. The recipient will receive the ZUS Gift Card and redemption code through the selected channel (Email/SMS). 
9. You may check your purchased gift card under ZUS Gift Card History.
10. If the sender chooses to send an email then a personalised message will show in the recipient's email. SMS then will show after the recipient redeemed the code.
11. To re-share, you can find the share button from ZUS Gift Card History. The personalised message will be shown after the recipient has redeemed the code.

summary:
Customer sentiment: Frustrated  
Primary Concern: The customer did not receive their order due to a coffee machine issue at the outlet.  
Identified Problem: The coffee machine at the outlet was malfunctioning, preventing the order from being fulfilled.  
Contributing Factors:  
- The customer was not informed about the coffee machine issue prior to placing the order.  
- There may have been a lack of communication between the outlet and the customer service regarding the status of the order.  
Resolution Offered: The order was canceled, and a refund was issued to the customer's ZUS balance.  
Overall Summary: The customer initially reached out regarding their order, which had been marked as delivered, but they had not received it due to a malfunctioning coffee machine at the outlet. After expressing their frustration and requesting a cancellation and refund, the agent confirmed the issue and processed the refund to the customer's ZUS balance. The root cause of the issue was the coffee machine problem at the outlet, compounded by a lack of prior communication about the issue to the customer.

summary:
Customer sentiment: Frustrated  
Primary Concern: Missing velvet creme in the coffee order  
Identified Problem: Miscommunication regarding the addition of velvet creme to the drink  
Contributing Factors:  
- The barista confirmed the velvet creme was added, but it may have dissolved before the customer received the drink.  
- Lack of clarity in communication about the drink preparation process.

The agent confirmed with the barista that the creme was added but suggested it may have dissolved. The customer was refunded RM11.90 as a token of apology. The root cause appears to be a miscommunication regarding the drink preparation and the potential quality issue with the velvet creme.

summary:
Customer sentiment: Upset  
Primary Concern: Drink spilled during transport, causing damage to the paper bag and car seat.  
Identified Problem: The cup lid was loose, leading to the drink leaking.  
Contributing Factors:  
- Poor packaging of the drink (loose lid).  
- Lack of proper handling instructions for customers regarding drink transport.  
Resolution Offered: Refund to ZUS Balance; customer opted to keep the balance for future orders.  
Overall Summary: The customer expressed frustration over a spilled drink from their order, which damaged both the paper bag and their car seat. The root cause identified was a loose cup lid that allowed the drink to leak. The agent offered a refund to the customer's ZUS Balance, which the customer accepted, and they expressed appreciation for the assistance provided. The interaction highlighted a need for improved packaging and handling instructions to prevent similar issues in the future.

- Lack of communication regarding the status of the rider  
- Customer's urgency due to colleagues wanting to leave work

Overall Summary: The customer expressed frustration over a significant delay in their coffee order, which was placed at 3:45 PM but had not been picked up after an hour. The agent informed the customer that the delay was due to traffic issues affecting the rider. After repeated requests for cancellation, the agent processed the cancellation and offered a refund to the customer's ZUS Balance. The root cause of the issue was the delay in the rider's pickup, exacerbated by a lack of timely updates to the customer.

Customer sentiment: Frustrated

Contributing Factors:

The interaction highlighted issues with order fulfillment and communication, which contributed to the customer's dissatisfaction. The resolution provided was a partial refund, but the customer was still left feeling inconvenienced.

However, I waited more than 45 minutes to get my coffee today.My order number is 2122, yet orders 2123 and 2126 were served faster than mine. I noticed that some customers who arrived after me received their orders before I did. I asked the barista twice about my coffee, but they only responded that they were preparing it and asked how much coffee I ordered.

summary:
Customer sentiment: Frustrated  
Primary Concern: Inability to receive additional cups of ice for an order  
Identified Problem: The customer was not able to get the extra cups of ice they requested, which led to escalating frustration.  
Contributing Factors:  
- Miscommunication regarding the customer's request for additional ice.  
- The customer felt their status as an elite member was not being acknowledged or respected.  
Resolution Offered: The agent informed the customer that they could not provide the extra cups of ice and suggested contacting customer support at another time.  
Overall Summary: The interaction involved a customer, Khloe Osman, who was frustrated with the inability to receive two additional cups of ice for their order. Despite being an elite member, the customer felt their request was not adequately addressed, leading to a series of escalating complaints and derogatory remarks. The root cause of the issue appears to be a combination of miscommunication and a perceived lack of recognition of the customer's status, resulting in a negative experience and dissatisfaction with the service provided.

summary:
Customer sentiment: Frustrated  
Primary Concern: Double payment charges not reflected in the user's ZUS wallet  
Identified Problem: Possible system error or bank processing issue causing payment discrepancies  
Contributing Factors:  
- User's bank has deducted the payment but it is not showing in the ZUS wallet  
- Payment status shows as "pending" despite the agent confirming the order was successfully paid  
Resolution Offered: The agent assured the customer that a refund for the double payment would be processed, but it may take up to 14 working days depending on the bank. The agent also requested proof of deduction to assist further.  
Overall Summary: The customer raised a concern about being charged twice for a payment that was not reflected in their ZUS wallet. The agent acknowledged the issue, attributed it to potential bank errors, and promised a refund while requesting additional information to assist further. The interaction highlighted a possible system error or miscommunication regarding payment status, leading to the customer's frustration.

summary:
Customer sentiment: Frustrated  
Primary Concern: Delay in receiving a drink order and lack of driver availability  
Identified Problem: Insufficient number of riders available in the area to fulfill the order  
Contributing Factors:  
- System limitations in rider allocation  
- High demand or low supply of riders at the time of the request  
Resolution Offered: The agent informed the customer that if a rider could not be found within a specified timeframe, a refund would be issued to the customer's ZUS Balance.  
Overall Summary: The customer expressed frustration over the delay in receiving their drink order and requested a driver to pick it up. The agent explained that the system was attempting to allocate a rider but faced challenges due to a lack of available drivers in the area. The customer was informed about the possibility of a refund if the order could not be fulfilled within the designated time. The root cause of the issue was identified as insufficient rider availability, leading to the customer's dissatisfaction.

summary:
Customer sentiment: Frustrated  
Primary Concern: Order not received  
Identified Problem: The order was marked as delivered but was not received by the customer or the designated recipient.  
Contributing Factors:  
- The delivery instructions provided by the customer may not have been followed or communicated effectively to the delivery personnel.  
- The order was returned to sender, indicating a possible issue with the delivery process or miscommunication with the guard.  
Resolution Offered: A recovery order was arranged to resend the drinks with specific instructions for the delivery.  
Overall Summary: The customer expressed frustration over not receiving their order, which was marked as delivered. Despite leaving specific instructions, the order was not found by the designated recipient. The agent confirmed the order was returned to sender and offered to resend the drinks, which the customer accepted. The resolution involved creating a new order with additional instructions for the delivery. The root cause appears to be a failure in the delivery process and communication of instructions.

Primary Concern: Cancellation of order due to an extended waiting period  
Identified Problem: Incorrect order ID entry leading to confusion and delays in processing the cancellation  
Contributing Factors:  
- Customer's order ID was not recognized by the system  
- Miscommunication regarding the order ID verification process  
Resolution Offered: Order was successfully cancelled and refunded to the customer's ZUS Balance  
Overall Summary: The customer, Nurul, initially faced frustration due to an extended waiting period for their order and attempted to cancel it. The agent struggled to verify the order ID provided by the customer, leading to repeated requests for confirmation. After confirming the customer's identity and understanding the cancellation reason, the agent successfully cancelled the order and issued a refund to the customer's ZUS Balance. The primary issue stemmed from the system's inability to recognize the order ID, causing delays and confusion in the cancellation process.

summary:
Customer sentiment: Frustrated  
Primary Concern: Delay in coffee order and missing items  
Identified Problem: System glitch causing order not to be reflected, leading to delays and incorrect items received  
Contributing Factors:  
- Order status not updated in the system, causing confusion for the rider and customer  
- Customer received incorrect items (missing drink and diluted americano)  
Resolution Offered: Refund for the missing and diluted drinks was processed, but customer is still awaiting confirmation of the refund in their bank account  
Overall Summary: The customer expressed frustration over a delayed coffee order that was placed at 8:46 AM but not received by 10:05 AM. They reported that the order was not reflected in the system, causing issues with the delivery rider. Additionally, the customer received incorrect items, including a missing drink and a diluted americano. A refund was processed for the missing and diluted drinks, but the customer is still waiting for the refund to appear in their Maybank account, leading to further inquiries and dissatisfaction. The root cause appears to be a system glitch affecting order processing and communication.

summary:
Customer sentiment: Frustrated  
Primary Concern: Order returned due to a system error with the delivery address  
Identified Problem: System error that caused the customer's home address to not appear for delivery  
Contributing Factors:  
- Lack of clarity in communication from the agent regarding the issue  
- Possible technical issues in the order management system that failed to display the address  
Resolution Offered: Resending the order to the customer  
Overall Summary: The customer experienced frustration due to their order being returned because a system error prevented their home address from being displayed for delivery. Despite multiple attempts to communicate the issue, the agent struggled to understand the customer's concern initially. Eventually, the customer requested the order to be resent, which was confirmed with a new order number provided. The root cause of the issue appears to be a technical failure in the system that affected the delivery process.

summary:
Customer sentiment: Frustrated  
Primary Concern: Extended waiting period for order preparation  
Identified Problem: Delay in order preparation leading to cancellation request  
Contributing Factors:  
- Customer's change of location (no longer at Nusentral)  
- Miscommunication regarding the status of the order (barista indicated it was not being prepared)  
Resolution Offered: Order was successfully cancelled, and the customer was informed about the refund process  
Overall Summary: The customer expressed frustration due to an extended waiting period for their order, which was not being prepared as expected. This led to a cancellation request. The agent successfully cancelled the order and provided information on the refund timeline, which depends on the payment method used. The root cause of the issue appears to be a combination of the customer's change in location and a miscommunication about the order's preparation status.
